message: Bullshit article. He helped that guy

ONE PERSON! A whole classroom of people and only ONE tried to stop him! The people in this country need to stop being victims. I keep picturing those Iraqi solders being marched out by ISIS to be beheaded. If you know you're gonna die FIGHT BACK WITH EVERY FIBER OF YOUR BEING!! As an US Army soldier (12 bravo) and a US Marine (0811) I tip my hat to the ONE gentleman who fought back. GOD BLESS YOU, speedy recovery!
Hope they find who did this ,someone knows who did it.
Swamp coolers!

Sony is saying that technology progresses. Is there somehow who actually disagrees with that? Everyone crying tears into a pillow that their PS4v1 might no longer be the top dog of consoles should get a grip. Technology is obsolete before it even hits retailers. How do these sorts of stories yield so many nonsensical replies? The heat comments are garbage, betraying a fundamental misunderstanding of the entire field. GPUs get better. Indeed, one of the biggest improvements lately has been *huge* reductions in the power consumption, and thus heat, of GPUs.

My son worked for Sendiks all through high school & college. During the school vacations & every summer he worked full time & even got a Christmas bonus. He loved working for them & was treated well. Maybe not offering full time work to someone is a way of getting rid of employees who aren't working out well. He was pd $8.00 an hr, which was way over minimum wage then.
